name: Hello Racoon Neighbor
description:
Not everyone likes neighbors, especially if they are not nice. A strange newcomer moved into your neighborhood who is hiding something. You have to face with this unusual neighbor, whose home is fraught with a big secret.
Get into his house unnoticed and try to figure out the dirty secret. Be careful and avoid all the traps!

The main character is you, thanks to the FPS view. The tranquil suburban atmosphere is disrupted by a new neighbor who has recently moved there. You discover some oddities in the behavior of your new neighbor. He rarely leave his home and some strange noise is heard behind the doors. In a dark evening, you saw something unusual in his garden. Maybe he is the most dangerous person in the neighborhood and it would be better if you avoid him, but you need to get into the neighbor's house and find out what's going on! Be unnoticed and get in the house and look around! Solve the mistery fast, because if he discovers you, you will not to be able to leave the house alive!
